website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS M3 offers dSLR-quality photos and a nice design, but its feature set is average, performance is sluggish and its price relatively high, at least in the US and the UK.
pros: A very well-designed mirrorless interchangeable-lens camera, the EOS M3 offers high-quality photos
cons: It's slow, with a relatively limited feature set for the price

customer_reviews.title: Better than the reviews would lead you to expect
customer_reviews.text: This is a big improvement over the original EOS M. Like the original, you can use all your EOS lenses with an adapter, as well as the small number of lenses designed especially for this format. I have a Canon G7x that performs very well, but the larger sensor of the EOS M3 have displaced it for many purposes. I think this camera is better than many of the reviewers have said. If you're a Canon user, and are looking for something in between a full frame model and a carry-everywhere, pocket-sized camera, you should definitely consider the M3.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Y. Lind

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, obviously you will need to buy some accessories with it for it to work. I am not a professional photographer but this thing makes it look like I am. The default mic that comes on this is surprisingly good. I bought an external one because I wanted to ensure good quality and I don't even use it. I've had this for a year now and I baby it... the other day it fell on the concrete hard. Luckily the thing took the beating and no harm done, I was surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Camera Kit directly from Amazon. I am very pleased with the camera and Amazon was great as usual. However, a couple of weeks after this purchase Canon announced a new model, the M5. While I could have returned this kit, I decided to keep it as I wanted the lenses and the difference in price, two lenses plus camera vs. two lenses only was $180, i.e., I got the M3 body for just $180. I have pre-ordered the M5 as it is substantially improved. However, having the M3 body will come in handy, it is smaller and lighter than the M5 and should serve me well for different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Buy with CONFIDENCE
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was used, the ONLY defect I could find were surface level scratches on the removable sensor cap! The body itself was absolutely flawless, and for the price I paid this is an absolute steal. If you are looking for an entry level camera with interchangeable lenses and Canon quality, but don't want to go into debt, used M series cams are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wade

customer_reviews.title: Vlogging camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's so easy to transport, and it had a microphone jack which is super nice to get better audio. Internal mic isnt bad, but it of course doesnt compare to a Rode video mic pro. Great for vlogs!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Massa

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a digital camera for your FD lenses ?
customer_reviews.text: If you want to use your old FD lenses, this is one of the best choices. All you need is an adapter ring "Fotasy Canon FD FL Lens to Canon EOS M". The pictures turn out great, you just have to get used to the manual adjustment but there is an automatic ISO adjustment to help, if you want.
customer_reviews.author: CLL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Canon mirrorless EOS camera.
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact camera with high pixel count and advanced features. I use it with the optional electronic view finder so I can see what I'm shooting in the daylight, and also have live viewfinder while shooting video. With the lens mount adapter I can use any of my Canon EOS lenses with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best Price!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be in a great condition, been playing with it since day one and I am very in love with it, some people say there are better cameras for the price but it is not always about the camera, however this one is a pretty good one ☝️
customer_reviews.author: Themickyway

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great photos and is so compact compared to standard DSLR's. We love the fact that the lens adapter allows us to use the EOS lenses we already had. RAW photo capability is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: GLF

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my dad. This camera is better then I thought it was going to be now I have it in hand. It takes great photos, it's easy to use, and looks like new. I'm happy with how fast is came in the mail too. Now my dad can stop using his cheap phone as a camera and take better photos lol.
customer_reviews.author: ViperRider

customer_reviews.title: didn't come with everything it said it would
customer_reviews.text: Camera and lens are in great shape but the battery it came with is dead and won't charge and the SD card did not arrive. I now have to pay $40 to get those necessary items that I thought I would be getting alongside the camera :/ other than that the camera is nice just wish I could use it right away.
customer_reviews.author: sofia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and kit. I am not sure why people are complaining about battery life because it lasted us a full day of vlogging and taking pictures! I would recommend getting a screen protector to keep it safe. Other than that the camera is excellent and I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I like the compact camera but focus is not always there ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact camera but focus is not always there so i am hit and miss some good shots. I like the menu. Easy to operate. I took it back because of the it focuses very slow
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Consistent controls with other Cannon cameras. Good picture quality. Easy to use and the instruction manual easy to understand. I'm very happy with this camera and looking forward to expand my photography skill set.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck! Whether your a Pro, or an Intermediate Photographer this camera is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.

customer_reviews.title: Best mirrorless camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Best mirrorless camera ever!! Soo easy to use. Soo worth buying it. I highly recommend this product especially for those who love to vlog. 👌👍
customer_reviews.author: JBAGSTN

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's small and good for traveling. I'd recommend it to anyone who is just starting out in photography.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Best Store Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am very impressed by the condition of the camera! It looks brand new! Thank you Happy Camera! It won’t be my last experience with the same store! I am a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Areej

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera all the setting allows for so many options and the video is really good .
customer_reviews.author: Nedra. Russ

customer_reviews.title: I love it I use this all the time as my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it I use this all the time as my "small" camera. So I don't have to take the big one every time I go out
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the only item that I ordered that arrived whenit said it would. So far I have used it every day since receiving and besides the battery not being long lasting it has been great
customer_reviews.author: Taylor martin

customer_reviews.title: A great body
customer_reviews.text: The M3 body works great. All of my M accessories work with it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: H.E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love the camera and the fact I can use all my lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Judd

customer_reviews.title: it was a lot better than expected
customer_reviews.text: it was a lot better than expected, i boight it for vloggin', it takes amazing videos and great pics too! ✨✨✨
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST camera so far!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best camera I've ever owned. It is definitely better than carrying the big DSLR cameras. This camera is slightly smaller than the DSLR cameras but the quality is superb. One problem is that the autofocus is a little out of sync when I take close up pictures but all I do is stand back a little and just zoom in and everything is perfect. I mostly use this camera for food pics and vlogging. Also it's smaller than your slrs but still bigger than your typical point and shoots so it might be a little heavy to some people.
customer_reviews.author: Bam Bam

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Great
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I expected. Most of the time I leave my 70D at home & travel with M3 unless I am going on a shoot that I need more glass & capabilities. I am the photographer for our church & take new member, events, special activities, & shots for our web page& Facebook. The M3 lets me do all of that without hauling heavy loads.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great compact camera, if you have any other Large Canon and want to use same lenses this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this small compact mirrorless camera, it complements my canon 70D well, and I can swap the lenses. Also I noticed that this sensor does give me more of the scene then my 70D, its a little but noticeable when taking exact pic at same spot with same lens. I can't wait for the aftermarket batteries, thats the downside to new camera have to wait for a bit, because canon wants $70 for new one that would be a spare. I waited until canon improved there mirrorless cameras, and its about there of course you will read reviews that other brands have X or Y feature etc... but this one works great compared previous models.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Good camera bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Camera was great but batteries that came with where old and can only charge half way
customer_reviews.author: bria

customer_reviews.title: ... how cheap my item was but I would totally recommend buying items from here
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this was a scam at first because of how cheap my item was but I would totally recommend buying items from here! My camera works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Nauja Fair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how user-friendly it is. Very easy to operate. Great image quality even with just the lens kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jarah De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as said with the minor issue of the lens cap missing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: love this camera, half the size of my dslr but puts out great quality photos, I may not use the dslr again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget J Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Capable camera kit in a compact size
customer_reviews.text: This is actually our second EOS M3. I bought my wife an international version a couple of months back as an upgrade to her EOS M first version. This new version has all of our dislikes of the first version worked out. The battery life is way way better and the focus is not at all as frustratingly slow as the first M. The buttons could be a little bigger but there are always trade offs. After using my wife's M3 I found that I really like the compact size. I've always liked Canon's color on their digital cameras so I replaced my big heavy DSLR kit with the M3.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mayeux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner vlogging camera. It's much smaller than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Arnold

customer_reviews.title: More than satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It arrived on time and the camera works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Teffani Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I am beyond expectation.  Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with my new camera. I cannot highly recommend it. It is amazing. The features that I enjoy the most are: you can manually set your image, you can plug in an extra mic, it has the led and you can watch yourself while recording or taking photos, it is very lightweight. The only thing I don't like is not very convenient for vlogging because you have a big lense and maybe it make it little bulky to carry. But if you have a nice bag you can take it any where with you it is not heavy
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera it's really portable and takes amazing stills
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera it's really portable and takes amazing stills. Definitely does take some time to mess around with it to get use to its settings and what not
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight "easy to take with you" camera
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight DSLR camera. I love the set-up and controls on my Powershot G15 (if it had a larger sensor & tilt screen it would be my ideal camera) but this is a good camera for the money. Some of the buttons are a bit small (for review and on/off) so if you've large hands I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I think i am liking this. I am coming from a full frame DSLR. So it is small but appears to be a performer. The menu is quick to understand. There are a lot of options. I haven't tried them all. That might take a while. I wish it was a little bigger and i don't like the screen moving. These are just personal preferences that might not be shared by most people.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Just whip it out in public!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is PERFECT to have around at all times. My wife loves it as it fits neatly in her purse (as neatly as anything fits in there)... I love it because I can just whip it out at a moment's notice... the camera, that is... Could not be more pleased with the Canon M3. It is so compact, but has all of the image quality of my 7D. As I always say, the best camera for the job is the one you have with you. Having a multi-glassed, $10000 monstrosity safely tucked away at home is worthless when the perfect shot comes along unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: New Nomads Press

customer_reviews.title: Super camera I am very happy with my purchase I ...
customer_reviews.text: Super camera I am very happy with my purchase I have 2 lenses 18-55mm and 22mm 2f I have a samsung nx500 and nx300 Canon eos m3 a beautiful crisp photos Card Lexar Professional 1000x 64GB SDXC UHS-II/U3 Up to 150MB I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tadeusz laskowiecki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a DSLR lover who hight needs quality images at compact size and better price!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great, until I left it on the subway! I liked it enough to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Chong

customer_reviews.title: Great compact high quality camera!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for with a baby on the way! Great compact size and great quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my wife loves this camera.
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves this camera. shoots as clear as a DSLR but is a lot more compact and easier to take places
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pros: Relatively smaller & lighter than EOS, my ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Relatively smaller & lighter than EOS, my EF lens can be used with the converter Cons: Less lens line-up yet, not so small & light as I thought
customer_reviews.author: tetsuinside

customer_reviews.title: m3 camera for use in astronomy
customer_reviews.text: testing the M3 camera on telescope for astronomy. seems to work nicely. But it has a problem in most other uses, it has to focus the lens for you!! and most M3 lenes are AUTO focus.. so you can not take pictures in the dark or of the astronomy stars in the sky. for astronomy you have to use "M" manual setting and turn off all auto stuff. sensitivity is good.
customer_reviews.author: astro

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for both the Casual and Professional User
customer_reviews.text: I've been a professional Canon user for over 40 years and currently own 10 Canon bodies and a large number of lenses. I use the EOS M series of cameras as my everyday "go everywhere" camera and have been thoroughly pleased with their performance and quality of images. I would recommend the camera with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Havican

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended over Sony
customer_reviews.text: Great choice when upgrading from a point & shoot. Images are solid & video function adjust to light fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: Modest Health

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with functions understandable to sometime photographer. Also, not a bad price for the finely made camera. Just wished the adapter sold more reasonably as the lens for this camera are limited,
customer_reviews.author: S. Hard

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Nice successor to the original M camera. Takes nice pictures and is great when an DSLR is too big or heavy to carry. Includes a pop up flash and tilting display. Uses the same lenses as the original M camera.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Joe Wynman

customer_reviews.title: I love the small form factor
customer_reviews.text: I love the small form factor, picture quality, canon lenses, and ease of use. The 22mm lens makes this a great walk around set up which can fit into a pocket. I'm only leaving four stars because the auto focus when using the lens adapter is pretty slow. I love everything else about the camera and the direction Canon is going with mirrorless in general.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Allen

customer_reviews.title: Superb camera.
customer_reviews.text: Lovin this camera. Everything about it is superb. But would prefer a viewfinder, which is an add on later.
customer_reviews.author: Rainier

customer_reviews.title: Mixed factors' product
customer_reviews.text: Over priced product. It will do the job just kind pricy.
customer_reviews.author: An odinary father

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it what a great product for selfie hahaha
customer_reviews.author: MISS LEI

customer_reviews.title: professional shots
customer_reviews.text: great canon to look like a professional or be a professional photographer!
customer_reviews.author: april d. brown

customer_reviews.title: A stupid feature that cannot be turned off and makes the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you use a manual flash then this camera will not work for you. You cannot turn off exposure simulation so if you are manually exposing for a flash, the image on the screen goes dark so you cannot compose or focus your shot. A stupid feature that cannot be turned off and makes the camera inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: Stoopkid

customer_reviews.title: Just dont fall in luv
customer_reviews.text: Love this dayum camera. I started to use this more than my 70D
customer_reviews.author: Josef Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for some, but not for semi-pros and above.
customer_reviews.text: Great image quality, however no view finder was a show-stopper for me. I'm not going to be forced to take photos at "arms length" simply because Canon can't figure out how to build in a view finder. Maybe the M4 will be when they get it right (for me) but for now, I'm returning it. But notice the 4-stars, that is for the camera itself, the build quality and images it produces. Aside for the lack of View Finder, the one other design flaw in my view, is the On/Off button. It is so difficult to locate and press that it made me laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cozzi

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SLOW Autofocus
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to the autofocus on the Canon DSLRs. I used this camera (pics of my kids, our dog, and at a Crossfit completion)with my all-purpose telephoto and my 50mm and the autofocus was so slow I couldn't handle it. I lost SO many shots. My iPhone focuses faster than the M3. Tragic because the picture quality is outstanding. Unless you're taking pictures of stationary objects, I fear you'll be as disappointed as I was.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Still image quality was fine. Video capabilities are exaggerated
customer_reviews.text: Glorified point and shoot. Still image quality was fine. Video capabilities are exaggerated, even when referred to as mediocre. Bought this as a Static second camera for interviews. Took one 26 sec. clip to convince me otherwise. AF was soft and searching, MF even with peaking was soft. I could have picked up a used t2i with a nifty 50 for 1/3 of the price and been ahead of the game. Save yourself the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Richmond

customer_reviews.title: hate it!
customer_reviews.text: i recently bought this camera and it keeps saying memory card error!!! i have tried everything and kept browsing how to solve it. about to return this camera. hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the quality of the images this camera produced
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of the images this camera produced. I am also not very happy that I returned this camera and it was received 10/28 and as of 11/6 I still haven't received my credit. I have a lot of Canon camera products and I used to recommend their products to all of my friends. I expected a little more out of Canon, I have asked for a status on my return twice and haven't received any communication back.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A.

product_meta.title: Canon EOS M3 Mirrorless Camera Kit with EF-M 18-55mm Image Stabilization (IS) STM Lens - Wi-Fi Enabled (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:18-55mm| Configuration:BaseDesigned to inspire, the EOS M3 digital camera brings true EOS performance and image quality to a compact, stylish and elegant package. A pleasure to operate, with the sophistication to create stunning still and moving images, the EOS M3 is an ideal EOS for many applications, such as portraiture, landscape, travel and everything in between. With its large 24.2 megapixel APS-C sized CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6 image processor, the EOS M3 captures high-resolution images and full HD movies suitable for most any application. Its lightweight, mirrorless body and interchangeable lenses add a whole new level of portability to the EOS system without compromising performance. In addition to a number of dedicated EF-M lenses, the EOS M3 is compatible with a range of EF and EF-S lenses and Speedlight's, has an optional shoe-mounted electronic viewfinder, wireless capabilities, plus numerous features designed for fun and fast image capture. The EOS M3 defies the assumption that compact means compromise, with performance and features photographers and moviemakers can rely on to help bring their creative ideas to life.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


EOS IN A NEW LIGHT
Designed to inspire, the EOS M3 digital camera brings true EOS performance and image quality to a compact, stylish and elegant package. A pleasure to operate, with the sophistication to create stunning still and moving images, the EOS M3 is an ideal EOS for many applications, such as portraiture, landscape, travel and everything in between. With its large 24.2 Megapixel APS-C sized CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6 Image Processor, the EOS M3 captures high-resolution images and Full HD movies suitable for most any application. Its lightweight, mirrorless body and interchangeable lenses add a whole new level of portability to the EOS system without compromising performance. In addition to a number of dedicated EF-M Lenses, the EOS M3 is compatible with a range of EF* and EF-S* Lenses and Speedlites, has an optional shoe-mounted electronic viewfinder, wireless capabilities, plus numerous features designed for fun and fast image capture. The EOS M defies the assumption that compact means compromise, with performance and features photographers and moviemakers can rely on to help bring their creative ideas to life. 

* Mount Adapter EF-EOS M is required.

SLEEK, WITH THE POWER TO PERFORM
Wonderfully lightweight and compact, the EOS M3 is both stylish and speedy while including a host of proven EOS controls. It can be appealing to anyone who appreciates a portable, mirrorless body but wants interchangeable lenses, a large sensor and the manual controls and image quality associated with the EOS line. Similarly, for photographers used to carrying larger SLR cameras who want something smaller as a companion or as a solo camera, the EOS M3 operates and performs similarly to SLRs in the EOS system. In addition to EF-M series Lenses, it's also compatible with a number of EOS accessories including EF Lenses*, Speedlites and more for powerful, seamless EOS operation that's incredibly portable.

* Mount Adapter EF-EOS M is required.

THE POWER TO CAPTURE STUNNING MOVIES AND PHOTOGRAPHS
24.2 MEGAPIXEL SENSOR
The EOS M3 features a 24.2 Megapixel (APS-C) sensor capable of capturing large image and movie files. At 24.2 Megapixels, the EOS M's sensor delivers images suitable for enlargements with sufficient resolution for significant trimming. Whether making poster-sized prints, zooming in on a particular detail or making Full HD movies, the EOS M3's sensor is primed to deliver. An ISO range of 100–12800 (expandable to 25600) means images can be captured with low noise and high detail, even in dimly lit situations.

DIGIC 6 IMAGE PROCESSOR
Complementing the EOS M3's CMOS sensor, Canon's DIGIC 6 Image Processor not only speeds up camera operations, but also helps enhance a number of the camera's advanced features. The DIGIC processor aids the camera's sensor in capturing detailed images with reduced noise at high ISOs and enables high-quality movie capture with a number of different movie compressions including MP4. On top of that, it enhances the camera's Dynamic Image Stabilization system and even helps improve the AF system's face detection accuracy.

CONSISTENT, SPOT-ON AF
A fusion of AF technologies designed to quickly achieve and maintain AF, the EOS M3's Hybrid CMOS AF III system is impressively fast, delivering comprehensive and accurate AF coverage over approximately 80% (vertical) and 70% (horizontal) of the entire image. With an optimized phase difference AF sensor built into the EOS M3's CMOS sensor's individual pixels, along with a secondary contrast detection system, the EOS M3's focus system is equipped to focus quickly and accurately in many situations.

FAST, INTUITIVE CONTROLS
Capable of creating superb stills and movies automatically, the EOS M3 offers a number of control options for speedy manual operation. The camera features a Front Dial that's placed directly around the shutter button and is complemented by a dedicated Exposure Compensation Dial positioned within easy reach of the camera's thumb grip. In addition, the EOS M3 has numerous custom functions, including user-programmable shortcuts, customizable buttons and much, much more. It's comfortable to hold, with a fluid and ergonomic design that's familiar to EOS users.

MORE OPERATIONS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
3.0” TILT-TYPE LCD MONITOR
The EOS M3 has a large, high-resolution, 3.0” LCD monitor that tilts up 180° and down 45°, ideal for composing not only self portraits, but also for taking pictures at high and low angles with ease.

INTUITIVE TOUCH SCREEN FOR SELFIES AND EASY MENU NAVIGATION
The EOS M3's touch screen is not just for defining AF points and for selfies! Designed to be accessible without hindering access to the lens and shutter button, the EOS M3's touch screen is fast and easy to use for many operations. With a Quick Control screen like those found on other EOS cameras and a number of functions superimposed over the image in a “U” pattern, settings are easily accessible without taking a finger away from the shutter or altering your grip on the camera. It's easy to change the camera's settings while maintaining the ability to quickly take a picture.

EOS COMPATIBILITY FOR CREATIVE CONTROL
While a number of lenses and accessories are designed specifically for the EOS M series, the EOS M3 is also fully compatible with over 70 of Canon's EF* and EF-S* Lenses plus other EOS accessories like Speedlites, Speedlite Transmitters and even Macro Ring Lites. Whether the EOS M3 is a primary or secondary camera, it boasts smooth compatibility with a wide range of EOS accessories.

* Mount Adapter EF-EOS M is required.

EXTERNAL ACCESSORIES FOR ADVANCED OPERATION
ELECTRONIC VIEWFINDER (EVF-DC1)
In addition to its compatibility with EOS accessories and Speedlites, the EOS M3 is compatible with Canon's high-resolution Electronic Viewfinder EVF-DC1. Easily attached to the camera's hot shoe, the 2.36 Megapixel EVF-DC1 can tilt up 90°, and for photographers who wish to hold the camera up to their eye, it helps the EOS M3 deliver operation and feel similar to that of an SLR. Especially helpful in bright sunlight, or in situations where composing on the screen is not convenient, the EVF-DC1 can be an indispensible accessory for the EOS M3.

EXTERNAL MICROPHONE JACK
For expanded operations including Full HD movie recording, the EOS M3 features not only a built-in stereo microphone but also an external microphone jack that adds a level of versatility and convenience for moviemaking.

SUPERB MOVIEMAKING MADE EASY
FULL HD VIDEOS AT 24P AND 30P IN MP4 FORMAT
The EOS M3 can capture 1920x1080 Full HD video at frame rates of both 24p and 30p, and can record in MP4 format for easy sharing online.

MOVIEMAKING MADE EASY WITH MANUAL MOVIE CONTROL
The EOS M3 is a fine moviemaking tool. With touch-activated AF and a number of manual controls available, it's easy to make intuitive setting adjustments silently and on the fly using the EOS M3's dial, controller wheel and touch operations. The EOS M3's external microphone jack adds further versatility to capturing video.

VERSATILE WIRELESS COMMUNICATION
BUILT-IN WI-FI
The EOS M3 is designed to make Wi-Fi connections* fast and easy. It can exchange data with other Wi-Fi compatible Canon cameras, connect directly to Canon's Connect Station CS100 device, upload directly to various web services like CANON iMAGE GATEWAY**, Facebook and YouTube, and even play back images and movies on DLNA-compatible digital electronics.

BUILT-IN NFC CAPABILITY
With its built-in NFC (Near Field Communication) capability***, the EOS M connects directly to NFC-compliant Android devices by simply touching the NFC icon located on the camera to the device.

REMOTE SHOOTING & WIRELESS PRINTING
With the Canon Camera Connect app installed, the EOS M3 connects and can be controlled by your compatible smartphone or tablet for simple remote shooting. Plus, it can also connect and print directly to IP-compatible printers.

* Compatible with iOS versions 7.1/8.4, Android smartphone versions 2.3.3/4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4/5.0/5.1 and Android tablet versions 4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4/5.0/5.1. Data charges may apply with the download of the free Canon Camera Connect app. This app helps enable you to upload images to social media services. Please note that image files may contain personally identifiable information that may implicate privacy laws. Canon disclaims and has no responsibility for your use of such images. Canon does not obtain, collect or use such images or any information included in such images through this app.
** One-time registration is required on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY online photo album.
*** Compatible with Android devices versions 4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4/5.0/5.1.

CREATIVE PHOTOGRAPHIC OPTIONS
With its built-in Creative Assist feature, the EOS M3 makes it simple to change camera settings in real time and see the effects as they happen. Whether adjusting brightness, sharpness, contrast, color tone and intensity or even moving to monochromatic images, the EOS M3 makes it easy for novices and professionals alike to find just the right look to match the emotion or tone of the image. Up to six personal settings can be saved and applied anytime when composing other images. Additionally, images shared from other photographers can be imported into the EOS M3, which can then display their settings and even apply them to the scene at hand. By helping the photographer to understand how different settings affect the look and feel of the photo or video, the EOS M3 can be an excellent learning tool.

SPEED, BUILT-IN
Don't let its compact size deceive–the EOS M3 is a fast and powerful camera. The EOS M3 captures images at up to 4.2 frames per second, even full-resolution RAW files! From still life to action photography and everywhere in between, the EOS M is ready to go.
feature_bullets: 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, ISO 100–12800 (expandable to H: 25600) and DIGIC 6 Image Processor can help capture photos and videos with stunning detail even in challenging lighting situations
Hybrid CMOS AF III helps provide fast and accurate focusing for stills and videos
Front Dial and Exposure Compensation Dial help provide full manual control and offer customizable functions as well as improved operability and ease of use
Create Full HD 1920x1080 movies at 24p and 30p in MP4 format with ease using manual movie control

Intuitive touch screen 3.0 tilt-type (180° up/45° down) LCD monitor (approximately 1,040,000 dots) can be perfect for selfies and allows for quick focusing and shooting, easy menu navigation and simple viewing of images and videos

Easily transfer images and videos to a compatible smartphone, tablet or Canon Connect Station CS100 device with built-in Wi-Fi and NFC capability, and share on social networking sites or view on an HDTV
Compatible with EF-M lenses as well as the full line of EF* and EF-S* Lenses (*using Mount Adapter EF-EOS M; not included) and Speedlites for expanded creativity
